programs.title: B.Tech — Computer Science & Engineering
programs.subtitle: 4-year degree with AI / ML & Data Science tracks
programs.shortDesc: Specializations: AI & ML, Data Science, Cybersecurity. 4-year program with internship opportunities.
programs.fullDesc: The B.Tech Computer Science & Engineering program offers a rigorous foundation in algorithms, systems, and software engineering with applied tracks in AI/ML and Data Science. Students complete capstone projects, an industry internship in year 3, and receive mentorship from partner companies.

programs.title: MBA — Marketing / Finance
programs.subtitle: 2-year industry connected MBA
programs.shortDesc: 2-year program with live projects and industry tie-ups for consulting and finance placements and many more.
programs.fullDesc: Our MBA program emphasizes practical experience: consulting live-projects, internships, and leadership labs. Industry practitioners teach elective modules and students participate in corporate immersion weeks and mentorship programs.

programs.title: M.Sc — Data Science & Analytics
programs.subtitle: Advanced analytics, ML & practicum
programs.shortDesc: Advanced data analytics, machine learning, and industry practicum for practical skills and placements and mnc companies.
programs.fullDesc: The M.Sc in Data Science is research-driven and practice-oriented. Students learn statistical foundations, deep learning, and deploy real models in capstone industry projects guided by faculty and industrial partners.

programs.title: BBA — Business Administration
programs.subtitle: Entrepreneurship and analytics focused
programs.shortDesc: Industry-linked curriculum focused on entrepreneurship, analytics and management essentials.
programs.fullDesc: A three-year undergraduate program combining fundamentals of management with practical skills in analytics, entrepreneurship and soft skills training. Industry internships and incubation bootcamps are core to the curriculum.

research.title: Center for Artificial Intelligence

steps.title: Application Submission
steps.desc: Complete the online application form with required documents.

steps.title: Entrance Examination / Merit
steps.desc: Take the entrance test or apply via national exam scores as applicable.

steps.title: Interview & Shortlisting
steps.desc: Shortlisted candidates go through a panel interview or group discussion.

steps.title: Offer & Fee Payment
steps.desc: Selected candidates receive an offer letter and complete fee payment to confirm admission.
